Comment: Abilities: A0N8 (Citadel Shield), Ubertip (Tooltip - Normal - Extended)
Value: Channel the Citadel Shield for up to 30 seconds. It will deal 40 damage per second in a 600 area of effect. It will also buff friendly units and buildings in the area giving them 10 additional armor. Has a 1100 seconds cooldown and 2 seconds casting time.
